name: Datafold
headline: Deal with analytical data quality in the pull request
description:
Datafold exists to make working with data more enjoyable and productive.

We are all about empowering data and analytics engineers. We find the most tedious, error-prone, and repetitive tasks and create tools to automate them. We make the world better by giving superpowers to data professionals who solve hard problems in various domains with data.

founders.name: Gleb Mezhanskiy, Founder
founders.description: In the past five years, I‚Äôve designed and built data platforms for three very different companies: Autodesk, Lyft & Phantom Auto, a mature public corporation, an exponentially growing marketplace, and a seed-stage startup at the time respectively. I've experienced first-hand the challenges of having poor data quality and observability in a data-driven environment and built multiple internal tools for data monitoring, data cataloging, and lineage.

# Data engineering without the manual work 
/‚Ä¢/
Accelerate data migrations, automate code testing and review, and streamline monitoring and observability with AI ‚Äî without ever compromising data quality.
[Request a Demo](https://datafold.com/<#>)[Pricing](https://datafold.com/</pricing>)
Powering leading data teams
speed and quality:
data migrations
ci/cd testing
monitors
code reviews
## AI acceleration for your critical workflows
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66fdd84c5d6e691f9b01e37c_KV.avif)
Use case / 01
## Migrate faster
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e1d34fca035b6e53b5ff05_Frame%2016118.svg)
Accelerate your data migrations by more than 6 months using Datafold's AI-powered SQL conversion and cross-database data diffing capabilities.
[Data migration testing](https://datafold.com/</data-migration>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66f710d48818930bd46393e4_Migrate%20faster.svg)
Use case / 02
## Deploy with speed and confidence
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e1d34f312da0c210f07cb7_Frame%2016118%20\(1\).svg)
Prevent data quality incidents before they hit production with automated CI/CD testing. Understand how your data changes with code updates, enabling you to identify unexpected regressions before deploying to production. 
[CI/CD Testing](https://datafold.com/</data-deployment-testing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66f710f4b2e0351adbd23cc1_Deploy%20with%20speed%E2%80%A8and%20confidence%402x.avif)
Use case / 03
## Monitor what you care about
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e1d34fc428dd118646fcfa_Frame%2016118%20\(2\).svg)
Automatically detect anomalies early and resolve data quality incidents with speed.
[Data Monitoring](https://datafold.com/</data-quality-monitoring>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66fc4dc05369bd5c155daa0b_graphic.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e19e6a9db22ee9ec39d081_KV%20-%20testimonials%20-%20grey.avif)
Customers
## How our customers are ensuring data quality with speed and confidence
Key metrics
100%+
data accuracy & quality KPI achievement
90%+
faster testing and code review
"Datafold helps you find the hidden changes you didn't know you made to your data, helping you if they're unintended or understanding what's causing them."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e2e48a50950ded47842587_image%20\(1\).avif)
Zachary Baustein
Lead Product Analyst
[Read full story](https://datafold.com/<https:/www.datafold.com/case-study/rocket-money>)
Key metrics
3+
Hours saved during the validation process for each new model
300+
Models rebuilt and validated in Snowflake
"Datafold allows real visibility into data changes before the changes are live, reducing mistakes and enabling our analysts and stakeholders to feel confident in their changes."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e2e43a48b38e9ee73e3dfe_image.avif)
Adam Underwood
Staff Analytics Engineer
[Read full story](https://datafold.com/<https:/datafold.com/case-study/eventbrite?>)
Key metrics
200+
HOURS OF TESTING SAVED PER MONTH
20%+
increase in productivity
"You can see right off the bat whether your data quality is what you were expecting, and reviewers can see it, too. Now we‚Äôre at the rate where we‚Äôre automating code reviews, or close to it, on 100 pull requests per month. And this is just the start." 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66eaac5732fd385ad6bdce82_image.avif)
John Lee
Director, Product Analytics

Security
## Security that works for you
Security / 01
### Flexible Deployment Options
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e2944efc19648005835bc3_Proximo.svg)
Multi-tenant, dedicated cloud, and on-premise deployment options
Security / 02
### Compliance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e2944ef99abe81c7d8ca07_Proximo%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e29c468057de4cc5cd9ccd_image%2025.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e29c46fb4093350e6dc677_image%2026.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e29c46cec064c20dedb74c_image%2024.avif)
SOC II Type 2, HIPAA, GDPR compliance
Security / 03
### Secure Access
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e2944fdd292f4642dc89b3_Proximo%20\(2\).svg)
Datafold ensures secure access to your data with role-based access control (RBAC), single sign-on (SSO), and SAML integration for enhanced user authentication and management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e0630c6eed1904371a5fa7/66e2a98512856d5d0639cdac_Group%20100997.avif)

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Datafold

**Mission:**  
Datafold is committed to enhancing analytical data quality specifically within the context of pull requests. They strive to make working with data not just productive but also enjoyable, effectively transforming the lives of data and analytics engineers.

**Founding and Background:**  
Founded in 2020 as part of Y Combinator's S20 batch, Datafold started with the vision of empowering data professionals. They focus on identifying and automating the tedious, error-prone, and repetitive tasks that plague data work.

**Location and Team:**  
Based in New York City, the company comprises a dedicated team of 24 employees, working collaboratively to innovate and enhance the data engineering landscape. Aaron Epstein serves as a group partner, lending support to the mission.

**Product Offering:**  
Datafold offers a range of solutions designed to streamline data workflows and improve data quality. Their main services include:

- **CI/CD Testing**: Automated testing that ensures data quality is upheld during deployments.
- **Data Migration Automation**: Tools that simplify and accelerate the data migration process.
- **Data Monitoring & Observability**: Enabling users to detect anomalies and ensure data integrity.
- **Data Replication Testing**: Ensuring accuracy in replicated data across systems.

**Technologies Utilized:**
Datafold leverages advanced technologies for data diffing, column-level lineage tracking, and integrated monitoring to provide robust solutions tailored for modern data stacks.

**Customer Impact:**  
The tools provided by Datafold have led to significant gains in productivity, with many customers reporting over 90% faster testing and a 20% increase in overall efficiency. The ability to automatically detect changes and preemptively resolve issues has been particularly well-received, allowing data teams to act with unprecedented confidence.

**Integration and Security:**  
Datafold seamlessly integrates with over 50 popular data tools, enhancing its utility across various platforms. They prioritize security with options for flexible deployment, compliance with standards like SOC II and GDPR, and secure access management.

**Conclusion:**  
Whether you're a data engineer tasked with ensuring the highest quality in your workflows or an organization looking to enhance your data operations, Datafold positions itself as a powerful ally. With a commitment to automating the technical drudgery of data management, they empower teams to focus on what truly matters: solving impactful problems and driving meaningful insights.

For more information, visit their website: [Datafold](https://datafold.com)
